mapper.sql: id, name, phone, address, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag, idcard, group_id, remarks
mapper.insert: insert into road_protection_group_people ( name, phone, address, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag, idcard, group_id, remarks) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update road_protection_group_people set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard=#{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update road_protection_group_people set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id}
